doc.field: Ads for Easter clothes from the Charlotte Observer in 1958.
Ads for Easter clothes from the Charlotte Observer in 1958.

South Park Magazine J.R. Thomas Shoe Store was at the “corner of Independence Blvd and Pecan Ave.” Did Thompson’s Bootery and Bloomery take over the corner later? Or different corner?
